General.Name: Tibet Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Tourism Co.,Ltd provides tourism services in China. Its tourism business offers supporting commercial services for various scenic spots, including property management, commercial activity planning, and cooperative development of government-enterprise commercial projects, etc. The company engages in the operation of tourist attractions, which includes supporting tourist services for scenic spots, product services, short-distance tourist transportation, etc.; and travel service business comprising exhibition services, online travel platforms, tourism product sales, and domestic and international tourism services. In addition, it is involved in the asset leasing, labor service export, and other businesses. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Lhasa, China.
General.Address: No. 6, Linku East Road, Lhasa, China, 850000
